hudson.tasks.Shell.command: #!/bin/bash if [ ! -d "/opt/faro/faro-api" ]; then mkdir -p /opt/faro/faro-api fi if [ -d "/opt/faro/faro-api/.venv" ]; then rm -rf /opt/faro/faro-api/.venv fi virtualenv --prompt='(faro-api)' --distribute --no-site-packages /opt/faro/faro-api/.venv if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo "Error creating virtualenv" exit 1 fi source /opt/faro/faro-api/.venv/bin/activate pip install -r pip-requirements.txt if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo "Error pip install pip-requirements.txt" exit 1 fi pip install -r test-requirements.txt if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo "Error pip install test-requirements.txt" exit 1 fi pip install tox if [ ! -d "/var/deploys/faro-api" ]; then mkdir -p /var/deploys/faro-api fi deactivate mv /opt/faro/faro-api/.venv .venv outfile=`fpm -f -n faro-api -s dir -t deb -v 0.1 --iteration $BUILD_NUMBER\ --deb-compression bzip2 --inputs MANIFEST\ -p /var/deploys/NAME/NAME_FULLVERSION_ARCH.TYPE\ --vendor "Wakemakin Development House L.L.C"\ -d python-dev -d python-virtualenv\ -d libmysqlclient-dev\ --description 'RESTful api for Project faro'\ --url "https://github.com/Wakemakin/faro-api" --prefix /opt/faro/faro-api` parsed_file=`echo $outfile | sed 's/[{}:" ]//g' | sed 's/,/\n/g' | awk -F"=>" 'toupper($1) == "PATH" {print $2}'` echo "Created deb: $parsed_file" if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo "Error creating deb" exit 1 fi if [ -e "/var/deploys/faro-api/latest" ]; then rm /var/deploys/faro-api/latest fi ln -s $parsed_file /var/deploys/faro-api/latest if [ -f "${HOME}/.gpg-agent-info" ]; then . "${HOME}/.gpg-agent-info" export GPG_AGENT_INFO export SSH_AUTH_SOCK fi freight-add $parsed_file apt/saucy apt/raring if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo "Error putting deb into repo" exit 1 fi freight-cache apt/saucy apt/raring if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo "Error caching repo" exit 1 fi rm .venv
